      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomloose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="de">Tiere auf dem Bauernhof. Memory</string>
            <string language="en">Farm animals. Memory</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animaux de ferme. Mémoire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Animais de fazenda. Memória</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Animali da fattoria. Memoria</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ζώα αγροκτημάτων. Μνήμη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Animales del campo. Memoria</string>
          </title>
          <language>de</language>
          <description>
            <string language="de">Zweimal Zwanzig Zeichnungen von Tieren stehen zur Verfügung.Diese können beschriftet und angemalt werden. Werden Sie ausgeschnitten und auf Karton geklebt, so entsteht ein Memory.</string>
            <string language="en">Suggestion of colouring and labelling the two times 20 drawings of animals provided. Being cut out and stuck on the cardboard they result in a Memory game.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Tier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Nutztier</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Bauernhof</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="de">Memory</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Utilizable animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Farm</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">MEMORY</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <aggregationLevel>
            <source>aggregationLevelValues</source>
            <value>1</value>
          </aggregationLevel>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Suggestion de la coloration et d'étiqueter les 
deux fois 20 schémas des animaux fournis. Étant coupé et 
collé sur le carton ils ont comme conséquence un jeu de mémoire.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Sugestão da coloração e de etiquetar os dois 
vezes 20 desenhos dos animais fornecidos. Sendo cortado e furado
no cartão resultam em um jogo da memória.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il suggerimento di colouring e di identificare i 
due volte 20 illustrazioni degli animali ha fornito. Essendo 
tagliando ed attaccato sul cartone provocano un gioco di memoria.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόταση και τους δύο χρόνους 20 σχέδια των ζώων 
παρεχόμενων. Αποκομμένος και κολλημένος στο χαρτόνι οδηγούν
σε ένα παιχνίδι μνήμης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sugerencia del colorante y de etiquetar los dos 
por 20 gráficos de animales proporcionados. Siendo cortado y 
pegado en la cartulina dan lugar a un juego de la memoria.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
